properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa naa kaapari lemi kalugadu Pachchikalapai parunda jeyu chunnaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shaanti karambagu sheresta jalamula chentha Nannadi pinchu chunnaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarvadaa naadu praanambunaku seda Deerchu chunnaadu Yehovaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thana naamamunu batti neethi maargamulo Nannu chakkagaa nadupu chunnadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cheekati loyalo ne thiriginanu etti Apaayamunaku bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee duddu karra nee dandamuthona Naadarinchi thodai yunduvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa shatruvula yeduta neevu naaku Bhojanamu siddaparachuduvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Noonetho naathala nanti yunnaavu Naa ginne nindi poruluchunnadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nannu ventaadu sadaa krupa kshemamu Nityamehovaa mandiramulo nundeda{/lang-eng}
